section.title: Interface to zlib
section.para: This is an &ffi-pac;-based interface to the &zlib-link;.
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-my; contains the symbol :ZLIB.

listitem.simpara: Return the string version of the underlying library.
Uncompress the &source-r; &vector-t; (returned by ZLIB:COMPRESS). destination-length should be no less than the length of the uncompressed &source-r;.
Return the maximum length of the return value of ZLIB:COMPRESS.
Return a descriptive string for the supplied &ecode-r;.
An &error-t; sometimes &signal;ed by ZLIB:COMPRESS and ZLIB:UNCOMPRESS. You can find the error code and the caller using ZLIB:ZERROR-ERRNO and ZLIB:ZERROR-CALLER.
